meanings.definition: A bundle of sensory nerve fibers in the brainstem.
meanings.sent1: The lemnisci in the brainstem help transmit sensory information.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the lemnisci in the brainstem to understand how we perceive sensations.
meanings.sent3: The lemnisci in the brainstem were having a party, sending signals back and forth.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts traveled along the lemnisci in her brainstem like a highway of information.
meanings.sent5: The lemnisci in the brainstem are like messengers delivering important news to the brain.

meanings.definition: A bundle of nerve fibers in the spinal cord.
meanings.sent1: The lemnisci in the spinal cord relay messages to the brain.
meanings.sent2: Injuries to the lemnisci in the spinal cord can affect sensory perception.
meanings.sent3: The lemnisci in the spinal cord were tangled up like a bunch of wires.
meanings.sent4: His emotions ran through the lemnisci in his spinal cord, connecting his heart to his mind.
meanings.sent5: The lemnisci in the spinal cord are like telephone lines carrying important signals to the brain.

meanings.definition: A bundle of nerve fibers in the brain.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are studying the lemnisci in the brain to understand neural pathways.
meanings.sent2: The lemnisci in the brain play a crucial role in transmitting information.
meanings.sent3: The lemnisci in the brain were dancing around, passing messages to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her memories traveled through the lemnisci in her brain, forming a web of experiences.
meanings.sent5: The lemnisci in the brain act like highways for information to travel efficiently.
